sentences.sentence: The media will report on it and the tabloids will build it up.
sentences.translation: 媒体将对它进行报导，小报将对其大肆宣传。

sentences.sentence: The story made the front page in all the tabloids.
sentences.translation: 这件事成了所有小报的头版新闻。

sentences.sentence: The story was on the front pages of all the tabloids.
sentences.translation: 所有小报都在头版报道了这件事。
